document.full_text: a washington state man who vowed after the september 11 attacks not to shave until osama bin laden was captured or killed, finally cut off his beard when he heard the news the al qaeda leader was dead.
document.title: with bin laden dead, washington state man finally shaves
lines_and_colors: a washington state man who vowed after the september 11 attacks not to shave until osama bin laden was captured or killed, finally cut off his beard when he heard the news the al qaeda leader was dead.
